content: Hello, welcome to my website! My name is Thean Yee Sin, or 禤宇善 in chinese. I'm a recent graduate from the Asia Pacific University of Innovation and Technology, specializing in Computer Science. This website serves as a showcase of my skills and projects, demonstrating my passion for technology and commitment to excellence. I will also regularly update this site to reflect my latest work and ongoing development. Thank you for visiting, and I hope you enjoy exploring my website, which offers a glimpse into my potential as a budding professional in the tech industry.
Know more about me more at the about tab.
